channel.title: Category on c13u's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Category on c13u's Blog

item.title: Articles
item.description: The ground truth for internet denizens.

item.title: Courses
item.description: Paul Graham said that reading stuff at a later time is beneficial because your mental model has [probably] grown, and therefore the content compiles differently. Ergo, revisiting course notes and taking new classes should get better with age.

item.title: Interesting Questions
item.description: Not exactly questions that keep me up at night, but they did motivate some research. The content is compiled from multiple sources, but too unpolished to be a blog post.

item.title: Papers
item.description: Disclaimer: I assume that papers are more trustworthy [1] than articles because of peer review. [1] Well, except white papers - those are veiled articles abusing the unquestionable authority that comes with being a PDF file.
